author: Veronika Kero
title: Bored? This crazy good deal gets you lifetime access to Rosetta Stone.
description: Our new normal can be summed up as: spending time at home. Working at home. Working out at home. Cleaning your home. Doing pretty much everything at home. Everything is uncertain to the point that we don't know how long we're going to have to keep doing this …
content:
Our new normal can be summed up as: spending time at home. Working at home. Working out at home. Cleaning your home. Doing pretty much everything at home.
Everything is uncertain to the point that we don't know how long we're going to have to keep doing this… [+3450 chars]
